| Edit this page View Source

GetCachedColumns(Type, DatabaseProvider, IEntityTypeConfiguration?)

Retrieves column metadata for the specified entity type from a cache, generating the mapping if it has not been cached previously.

Declaration
public static Column[] GetCachedColumns(Type entityType, DatabaseProvider provider, IEntityTypeConfiguration? config)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Type entityType

The CLR type of the entity.
DatabaseProvider provider

Database provider used for escaping identifiers.
IEntityTypeConfiguration config

Optional entity type configuration.
Returns
Type Description
Column[]

An array of Column objects describing the entity's columns.
